alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 4:51AM CDT until March 30 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Jefferson, Upper Plaquemines, Upper St. Bernard, Lower Jefferson, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Western Orleans, Eastern Orleans Parishes. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 8 AM this morning to 9 PM CDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 1 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
